meanings.sent1: The dark clouds foreshowed a storm approaching.
meanings.sent2: Her dream foreshowed the events of the next day.
meanings.sent3: The barking dog foreshowed the arrival of the mailman.
meanings.sent4: The sudden drop in temperature foreshowed the onset of winter.
meanings.sent5: The old man's coughing foreshowed his impending illness.

meanings.sent1: The fortune teller foreshowed a prosperous year ahead.
meanings.sent2: The weather report foreshowed heavy rain for the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The crystal ball foreshowed a surprise party in her future.
meanings.sent4: His accurate predictions foreshowed his talent in forecasting.
meanings.sent5: The seagulls flying inland foreshowed an approaching storm.
